product_name: Bay Area Rock: A Climber's Guide
long_description: Detailed maps and inspiring photographs give. Author: Jim Thornburg. Potlicker Press; copyright 2012. Softcover; 320 pages; color photographs and maps of routes and geographic location. Thornburg's expertise serves beginners as well as experienced climbers with detailed maps and graphics of routes superimposed on photographs. With routes arranged geographically, it's easy to explore one area in depth, or traverse the San Francisco area looking for new adventures.
short_description: Detailed maps and inspiring photographs give Bay Area Rock: Bouldering and Climbing everything you need to explore Northern California's natural landscape under your own power.
